actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to repeal the 25th amendment to that Constitution (relating to Presidential disability and Vice Presidential succession).

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Repeals the twenty-fifth amendment to the U.S. Constitution (relating to Presidential disability and Vice-Presidential succession).

titles.title: Joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to repeal the 25th amendment to that Constitution (relating to Presidential disability and Vice Presidential succession).
